user_input: Modify the DHEM model. Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. use the original file Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED Save file as Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the DHEM model specifications.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren’t 0 to 999

tasks.description: Open the file 'Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED', modify its content by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999, and save the result as 'Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. use the original file Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED Save file as Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED.', select the most appropriate file entity.
